title: TUTORIAL miniature daffodils from air dry clay in a basket | PDF + video
description: The price includes a tutorial on creating miniature daffodils and a basket from air dry clay for dollhouses at a scale of 1:12. This tutorial is a PDF file with a description of the necessary materials, a link to the video and text. For your convenience, the video is uploaded to YT and has subtitles in English. An active link to the video is inside the PDF file or via QR code. Please note that the video does not have voice acting!This tutorial is not suitable for beginners aâ€¦
